panels.description: 不可用的 RAM 内存
panels.title: 内存 %

targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: 所有 CPU 内核一起处于忙碌状态
panels.title: CPU %

targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "system" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "cpu_cores"
  )
  |> last()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "system" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "cpu_threads"
  )
  |> last()
  |> yield()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total"
  )
   |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()

threads = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" 
  )
  |> findRecord(
    fn: (key) => key["_measurement"] == "system" and key["_field"] == "cpu_threads",
    idx: 0,
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" and
    r["_field"] == "vcpu_current"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r["_time"], _value: r["_value"] / float(v: threads["_value"])})
  )

host = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
     r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}" 
  )
  |> findRecord(
    fn: (key) => key["_measurement"] == "hypervisor" and key["_field"] == "mem_total",
    idx: 0,
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["_field"] == "mem_total"
  )
   |> group(columns: ["id"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r["_time"], _value: r["_value"] / float(v: host["_value"])})
  )

from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" and
    r["hypervisor"] == "${hypers}"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "id")
  |> count(column: "id")
  |> yield()

Desktops = from(bucket: "isardvdi-go")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r["_measurement"] == "domain" 
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "id"])
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, column: "id", fn:(column, tables=<-) => tables 
    |> unique(column: column)
    |> count(column:column),)
  |> rename(columns: {id: "_value"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Desktops:r._value, _time:r._time }))
  |> yield()
Visors = from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ Visors:r._value, _time:r._time  }))
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice_tls")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "viewers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["viewer_type"] == "viewer_port_spice")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

targets.expr:
(count(present_over_time(isardvdi_domain_port_spice_tls{domain="$domain"}[1m]) * on(desktop) group_left isardvdi_domain_port_spice_tls{domain="$domain"} * on (port,hypervisor) group_left count_over_time(isardvdi_socket_recv_bytes{domain="$domain"}[1m])) or vector(0))  + 
(count(present_over_time(isardvdi_domain_net_rx_bytes{domain="$domain"}[1m]) * on (mac) group_left count_over_time(isardvdi_conntrack_rdp_recv_bytes[1m])) or vector(0)) +
(count(present_over_time(isardvdi_domain_port_vnc{domain="$domain"}[1m]) * on(desktop) group_left isardvdi_domain_port_vnc{domain="$domain"} * on (port, hypervisor) group_left count_over_time(isardvdi_socket_recv_bytes{domain="$domain"}[1m])) or vector(0))
targets.query:
from(bucket: "isardvdi-tasks")
  |> range(start: -10s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hypervisor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "visors_started")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
